title: The Mark 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC BRENYS
description:
Chad Turner ( Craig Sheffer ) was implanted with a computer chip to work only biometrically ( called The Mark of the Beast ) in the world . The chip has the power to change the world with who controls and Joseph Pike ( Gary Daniels ) is determined to acquire the chip , even in the face of the most unforeseen event " The Rapture " . Pike took hostage Mr. Cooper ( Eric Roberts ) , the security chief of Avanti , the chip maker in order to help locate Turner and deliver the chip to your boss . Amidst the chaos Chad Turner needs to win all odds to stay alive and not let the chip is in the wrong hands .
